title: "More than Human Community Toolkit"

## Overview

A collaboration with Goldsmiths focusing on developing tools and methods for engaging communities in more-than-human research and fostering connections between people and nature.

## Objectives

- Develop participatory research methods
- Create tools for community engagement with nature
- Foster interdisciplinary collaboration between arts, science, and communities
- Explore new ways of understanding human-nature relationships
